main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted maneuvering over Watertown, Connecticut on September 29, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The object passed overhead from west to east at high speed and very high altitude., The witness described the object as small and round., It was reported by a government employee who was on the scene., The sighting occurred under the glare of the approaching evening.
witness description: an employee on the scene field under the U.S. Government
